metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5752 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: When installing a package from a Mercurial VCS URL (ie "pip installhg+...") with pip prior to v23.3, the specified Mercurial revision could beused to inject arbitrary configuration options to the "hg clone" call (ie"--config"). Controlling the Mercurial configuration can modify how andwhich repository is installed. This vulnerability does not affect users whoaren't installing from Mercurial.

criterions.comment: python-pip package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
